attributes.additional_details:
i am trying to fight against the new law that is coming in place on the 1st of April 2013 they say that
1 person = 1 bedroom
couple (16+) = 1 bedroom
2 children aged 10 and under (regardless of sex) = share bedroom
2 children aged up to 16 years (same sex) = share bedroom
i know i wouldnt have wanted to share my bedroom with my sister till one one use were 16 or if i had a brother wudnt want to share with im till one of us were 10 its a joke please give ur thoughts on this.
